anya-e1212n:605_8: na hoti rukkhā patito-rañño puriso rājapuriso-bahulādhikārā ntamānaniddhāriyapuraṇa
anya-e1212n:605_9: bhāvati bhāvati ttatthehi nahoti-mamānukubbaṃ, mamānukurukamāno, gunnaṃkaṇhā sampannakhīratamā,
anya-e1212n:605_10: sissānaṃ pañcamo, paṭassa sukkatā-kvaci hoteva-vattamānasāmīpyaṃ, phalānaṃ titto,
anya-e1212n:605_11: phalānaṃ suhito, brāhmaṇassa kaṇhā dantā iccatra dantāpekkhā chaṭṭhiti kaṇhenasambandhābhāvā
anya-e1212n:605_12: na samāso-aññamaññasambandhānaṃhi samāsoyadā tu kaṇhā ca te dantā ceti visesanasmāso
anya-e1212n:605_13: tadā chaṭṭhi kaṇhadantāpekkāti brāhmaṇakaṇhadantāti hoteva-rañño māgadhassa dhanamiccatra
anya-e1212n:605_14: raññoti chaṭṭhi dhanamapekkhate na māgadhaṃ rājā eva māgadhasadadena vuccateti bhedābhāvā
anya-e1212n:605_15: sambandhābhāvoti tulyādhikaraṇena māgadhena saha rājā na samasyate-rañño asso ca
anya-e1212n:605_16: puriso cāti ettha rañño asso purisoti ca paccekaṃ sambandhato sāpekkatāya na samāso-asso
anya-e1212n:605_17: ca puriso cāti catthasamāse kate tu rājassapurisāti hotevaññānapekkhattā-rañño garuputtoti
anya-e1212n:605_18: ettha pana rājāpekkhinopi garuno puttena saha samāso gamakattā-gamakattampihi samāsassa
anya-e1212n:605_19: nibandhanaṃ-dāne soṇḍo dānasoṇḍo-kvaci vuttiyeva-pabbataṭṭho-kvacī samāsepi vibhatyalopo-jane suto.
anya-e1212n:607_0: Visesanaṃ syādyantaṃ vasessena syādyantena samānādhikāraṇena sahekatthaṃ hoti-nīlañca
anya-e1212n:607_1: taṃ uppalaṃ ceti niluppalaṃ-vākye tulyādhikaraṇabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ catasaddappayogo-vuttiyantu
anya-e1212n:607_2: samāseneva tappakāsanato na tappayogo-eva maññatrāpi vuttaṭṭhānamappayogo-bahulādhikārā
anya-e1212n:607_3: kvaci upamānabhutaṃ visesanamparaṃ bhavati-sīho’ca sīho-muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho-munisaddoyeva
anya-e1212n:607_4: vā visesanaṃ-tathāhi-sīhoti vutte upacaritānupacaritasīhānaṃ sāmaññappatītiyaṃ munisaddo
anya-e1212n:607_5: viseseti-sīlameva dhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ-dhammoti sammato dhammasammato-mahanti ca sā
anya-e1212n:607_6: saddhā cāti samāse kate-“itthiyambhāsitapumitthi pumevekattha”ta pumbhāvā ṅīppaccayābhāvo-“ṭantantunanti”ntassa
anya-e1212n:609: Nañiccetaṃ syādyantaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ hoti-ñakāro“ṭanaññassā”ti visesanattho-pāmanaputtādīsu mā hotūti.
anya-e1212n:611_0: Uttarapade nañsaddassa ṭa hoti-na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, nañayaṃ pariyudāsavutti pasajjappaṭisedhavutti
anya-e1212n:611_1: ca-paṭhamapakkhe-brāhmaṇa añño brāhmaṇantānajjhāsino khattiyādi brāhmaṇa sadisoyeva
anya-e1212n:611_2: abrāhmaṇeti vutte patiyate-itarasmiṃ pana pakkhe kenaci saṃsayanimittena khattiyādo
anya-e1212n:611_3: brāhmaṇeti pavantassa micchāñāṇanivutti karīyati-brāhmaṇe yaṃ’na bhavati brāhmaṇeti
anya-e1212n:611_4: brāhmaṇantajjhāsito na bhavatīti attho-tattha vinā sadisattaṃ micchāñāṇasambhavā
anya-e1212n:611_5: payogasāmatthiyā ca sadisapaṭippatti taggatāca liṅgasaṅkhyā bhavanti-atoyevoccate
anya-e1212n:611_6: nañivayutta maññasadisādhikaraṇe tathā hi atthasampaccayoti-tadevaṃ pakkhañcayeva
anya-e1212n:613: Sarādo uttarapade nañsaddassa ana hotīti nassa ana.
anya-e1212n:615_0: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahekatthā honti niccaṃ syādividhivisayato’ññattha-kucchito
anya-e1212n:615_1: brāhmaṇo kubrāhmaṇo-evaṃkupuriso-“purise vā”ti pakkhe kādese-kāpuriso-īsakaṃ uṇhaṃ
anya-e1212n:615_2: kaduṇhaṃ-“sare kada kussuttaratthe”ti kussa kadādeso-appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ-“kāppatthe”ti kādeso.
anya-e1212n:617: Pagato ācariyo pācariyo-evaṃ pantevāsī-suṭṭhukataṃ sukataṃ-kicchena kataṃ dukkataṃ.
anya-e1212n:621: Antabhutassāppadhānassa ghapassa syādisu rasso hotīti rasso.
anya-e1212n:629: Anekaṃ syādyanta maññassa padassatthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti-o tiṇṇo haṃso yaṃ so otiṇṇahaṃso-(jalāsayo).
anya-e1212n:630_0: Jito māro yena so jitamāro-(bhagavā)-jinnotaru yena so chinnataru(pharasu)dinno suṅko
anya-e1212n:630_1: yassaso dinnasuṅko(rājā)-apagataṃ kālakaṃ yasmā so apagatakālako (paṭo)pahutaṃ dhanaṃ
anya-e1212n:630_2: yassa so pahutadhano-(puriso)-natthi samo yassa so asamo-nassa ṭādeso-cittā gāvo
anya-e1212n:632_0: Antabhutassāppadhānassa gossa syādīsu u hoti-cittagu-(gomā)-mattāneke gajā yasmiṃ
anya-e1212n:632_1: taṃ mattānekagajaṃ-(vanaṃ) saha puttena vattamāno saputto saha putto vā-“sahassa
anya-e1212n:632_2: so’ññatthe“ti pakkhe sahassa so-dhavā ca badirā ca palāsā ceti viggahe.
anya-e1212n:634_0: Anekaṃ syādyantaṃ catthe ekatthaṃ vā bhavati-samuccayo’nvāvayo itarītarayogo samāhāro
anya-e1212n:634_1: ceti catatāro catthā-tattha itarītarayoge samāhāre ca ekatthībhāvo sambhavati padānaṃ
anya-e1212n:636_0: Catthe samāhāre yadekatthaṃ taṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati-samāhārassekattā ekavacanameva-dhavakhadirapalāsaṃ-kattha
anya-e1212n:636_2: bahuvacanaṃ-dhavakhadirapalāsā-samāse yaṃ pubbaṃ vūttaṃ tadeva pubbaṃ nipatati-kamātikkame
anya-e1212n:636_3: payojanābhāvā-kvaci vipallāsopi hoti bahulādhikārato-dantānaṃ rājā rājadanto-pāpā
anya-e1212n:636_4: bhumi yasmiṃ pāpā ca sābhumi ceti vā viggayha samāse samāsantveccādhikāro.
anya-e1212n:638: Pāpādīhi parā yā bhumi tassā samāsanto a hoti-pāpabhumaṃ, (ṭhānaṃ)-itthiyamiccādināāppaccayo nivattane-jātiyā upa lakkhitā bhumi jātibhumaṃ.
anya-e1212n:640: Saṅkhyāhi parā yā bhumi tassā samāsanto ahoti-dve bhumiyo assāti dvībhumaṃ-evaṃ tibhumaṃ, catubhumaṃ-bahulādhikārā kvaci na hekāti-catubhumi.
anya-e1212n:642_0: Dīghādīhi asaṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca parasmā rattisaddā anaññāsaṅkhyatthesu samasitā
anya-e1212n:642_1: samāsanto a hoti-dīghā ca sā ratti cāti dīgharattaṃ-aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ-ahassa
anya-e1212n:642_2: apādittā “manādyapādīnamo maye cā”ti o-vassāsu ratti vassārattaṃ-pubbā ca sā ratti
anya-e1212n:642_3: cātī pubbarattaṃ-evaṃ apararattaṃ, aḍḍharattaṃ-atikkanto rattiṃ atiratto-dvinnaṃ
anya-e1212n:644: Gosaddā alopacisayā samāsanto a hoti na ce catthe
anya-e1212n:645_0: Samāso aññapadatthe asaṅkhyatte ca-rañño go rājagavo-avaṅa-pañca gāvo dhanamassa
anya-e1212n:645_2: kiṃ?-Pañcahigobhi kīto pañcagu-visesanasamāse-“tena kataṃ kīta”miccādinā ṇike “lopo”ti
anya-e1212n:646: Pubbuttarobhayaññatthamiccekatthaṃ catubbidhaṃ visessaññobhayatthatā tidhā vakkhanti taṃ pare.
anya-e1212n:650: Itthiyaṃ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āppaccayo hoti-devadattā, ajā, kokilā, iccādi.
anya-e1212n:652_0: Ākatigaṇe’yaṃ-nadādīhi itthiyaṃ ṅīppaccayo hoti ṅakāro “ntantunaṃ ṅimhi to ve”ti
anya-e1212n:652_1: saṅketattho-nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇi, vāruṇi, gotamī, gacchanti-“ntantunaṃ ṅimhi
anya-e1212n:652_2: to ve”ti vā takāre-gacchatī-gacchatī-evaṃ guṇavanti, guṇavatī-“gotovā“ti nadādisu
anya-e1212n:652_3: pāṭhā vā ṅīmhi “gossāvaṅa”ti gosaddassa āvaṅa-gāvī, go.
anya-e1212n:656: Itthiyamivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi nī hoti bahulaṃ-payatapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, paracittavidunī.
anya-e1212n:662: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vā ṇappaccayo hotapacce’bhidheyye-ṇakāro ṇanubandhakāriyattho-ṇeneva apaccatthassa vuttattā apaccasaddāppayogo-“ekatthatāya”miti syādi lopo.
anya-e1212n:664: Sarānamādibhuta ye akārivaṇṇavaṇṇā tesaṃ ā e o honti yathākkamaṃ ṇanubandheti akārassa akāro.
anya-e1212n:666: Sarādo ṇanubandhe uvaṇṇassa avaṅhoti-tato syādi-rāghavoccādi-itthiyaṃ-rāghavaccādi-vā vidhānā raghussāpaccaṃ ragvapaccantipi hoti.
anya-e1212n:674_0: Vacchādito gottādibhutā gaṇato ca ṇana ṇayanappaccayā honti paputtādo’pacce-paputtappabhuti
anya-e1212n:674_1: gottaṃ-vacchassā paccaṃ vacchāno, vacchāyano-‘saṃyoge kvacī’ti vuttattā na vuddhi-katissāpaccaṃ
anya-e1212n:677: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerā vā yathākkamaṃ, honta pacce-kattikeyyo, veṇateyyo-vedhavero, sāmaṇero.
anya-e1212n:681: Sarānamādibhutā ye ayuvaṇṇā tesaṃ ā e o honti kvaci deva saṃyogavisaye ṇanubandheti visayasattamiyā niddiṭṭhattā saṃyogato pubbeva ekāro.
anya-e1212n:683: Yakārādo paccaye avaṇṇivaṇṇānaṃ lopo hoti-ditiyā apaccaṃ decco, kuṇḍaniyā apaccaṃ koṇḍañño-nassa ñe pubbarūpaṃ-bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabbo-ettha-
anya-e1212n:685: Yakārādo paccaye gossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅa hotīti ukārassa avaṅa.
anya-e1212n:687: Akārantato ṇi vā hotapacce bahulaṃ-dakkassāpaccaṃ dakkhi-evaṃ vāruṇi-bahulaṃ vidhānā na sabbehi akārantehi-te neva vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho tveva hoti.
anya-e1212n:689: Rājasaddato ñño vā hotapacce jātiyaṃ gammamānāyaṃ-rañño apaccaṃ rājañño-jātiyanti kiṃ?-Rājāpaccaṃ.
anya-e1212n:691: Khattasaddā yeyā hontapacce jātiyaṃ-khattassāpaccaṃ khattyo, khattiyo-jātiyantveva-khatti.
anya-e1212n:693: Manusaddato jātiyaṃ ssa saṇa hotapacce-makanuno apaccaṃ manusso, mānuso-jātiyantveva-mānavo.
anya-e1212n:695_0: Janapadassa yaṃ nāma, tannāmasmā khattiyāpacce raññe ca ṇe hoti-pañcālānaṃ apaccaṃ
anya-e1212n:695_1: rājā vā pañcālo, māgadho-janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ?-Dāsarathi-khantiyāti kiṃ? Pañcālassabrāhmaṇassāpaccaṃ pañcāli.
anya-e1212n:697: Kurusivīhapacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti-kurunaṃ apaccaṃ rājāvā korabbo, sebbo.
anya-e1212n:699_0: Rajjate yena so rāgo-tato rāgavācitatiyantato rattamiccetasmiṃ attheṇe hoti-kasāvena
anya-e1212n:699_1: rattaṃ kāsāvaṃ, kosumhaṃ-idha kasmā na hoti’ nīlaṃ pītanti? Guṇavacanattā vināpi
anya-e1212n:701_0: Tatiyattato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇe hoti tañce nakkhattaminduyuttaṃ hoti-phussena
anya-e1212n:701_1: induyuttena lakkhitā puṇṇamāsī phussī, pusso (aho)-maghāya induyuttāyalakkhitā puṇṇamāsī māghī, māgho (aho)
anya-e1212n:703_0: Seti paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ṇe hoti yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ sā dve devatā puṇṇamāsī
anya-e1212n:703_1: vā-sugato devatā asseti sogato-māhindo, yāmo, cāruṇo-phussī pusṇamāsī assa sambandhinīti
anya-e1212n:706_0: Dutiyantato tamadhīte tañjānātīti etesvattesu ṇehoti koṇiko ca-veyyākaraṇe-katayādesassikārassa“tadā
anya-e1212n:706_1: desā tadiva bhavanti“ti ñāyā sarānamaccādinā ekāre yāgamadvittāni-ke-kamako, padako-ṇike-suttantiko,
anya-e1212n:706_2: venayiko-“tena nibbatte”ti tatiyantā nibbattattheṇe-kusambena nibbattā kosambī, (nagarī.)
anya-e1212n:708: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇe hoti-udake bhavo odako-“ajjādīhi tano”ti bhavatthe tano-ajjabhavo ajjatano-evaṃ hīyattano-“ñonamavaṇṇe”ti akāro-“sarambhā dve”ti tassa dvibhāvo.
anya-e1212n:710: Purā iccetasmā bhavatthe ṇe hoti tano va-purā bhavo purāṇe, purātano.
anya-e1212n:712: Amā saddato acco hoti bhavatthe-amā bhavo amacco.
anya-e1212n:714: Majjhādīhi sattamyantehi bhavatthe imo hoti-majjhe bhavo majjhimo, antimo-kusiṇarāyaṃ bhavo ccevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:716_0: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bahulaṃ bhavatthe-kaṇa-kosiṇarako-ṇeyya-gaṅgeyyo, vāneyyo-ṇeyyaka-koleyyako-ya-gammo-rassākāralopapu-
anya-e1212n:716_1: bbarūpāni-iya-gamiyo, udariyaṃ-“ṇiko”ti sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti sarade bhāvo
anya-e1212n:718_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ṇiko hoti-vīṇāvādanaṃ sippamassa veṇiko.
anya-e1212n:718_1: Paṃjasukūladhāraṇaṃ sīlamassa pakaṃsukuliko, gandho paṇyamassa gandhiko, vāpo paharaṇamassa
anya-e1212n:718_2: vāpiko, sataṃ payojanamassa sātikaṃ“taṃhantārahati gacchatuñchaticarati”ti dutiyantā
anya-e1212n:718_5: dhammiko-adhammiko-“tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamabhiyaṅkhataṃ kasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti
anya-e1212n:718_6: jitaṃ jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati vahati jīvati”ti tatiyantā katādisvatthesu
anya-e1212n:718_7: ṇiko hoti-kāyena kataṃvakāyikaṃ-satena kītaṃ sātikaṃ-varattāya baddhovā rattiko-ghatena
anya-e1212n:718_8: abhisaṅkhataṃ kasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ-(abhisaṅkhataṃ katābhisaṅkhāraṃ, kasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1212n:718_9: missitaṃ)-jālena hato bhantītivā cāliko-akkhehi jitamakkhikaṃ-akkhehi jayati dibbatīti
anya-e1212n:718_10: vā akkhiko-khanittiyā khanatīti khānittiko-iha nabhavati “aṅguliyā khantī”ti anabhidhānā
anya-e1212n:718_11: abhidhānalakkhaṇa hi tabbādi ṇadisamāsā-uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko-sakaṭena caratīti
anya-e1212n:718_12: sākaṭiko-khandhena vahatīti khandhiko-vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko-“tassa saṃvattatī”ti
anya-e1212n:718_13: catutthyantā saṃvattatīti ponobhaviko-“manādyapādinamo maye ce”ti dutiyokāro.
anya-e1212n:720: Pañcamyantā sambhu tamāgatanti etesvatthesuṇiko hoti-mātito sambhutamāgataṃ vā mattikaṃ, pettikaṃ.
anya-e1212n:723_0: Vuttato’ññepi paccayā dissanti vuttāvuttatthesutiṇyo-sorabbhaṃ-“tattha vasati kaviditobhatto
anya-e1212n:723_1: niyutto”ti ṇiko-rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko, loke vidito lokiko, catumahārājesu
anya-e1212n:725_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti-saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, puggalikaṃ-“ṇe”ti
anya-e1212n:729: Anto saro ādi yassāvayavassa tassa lopo hoti rānubandheti ulopo-pitu bhātā petteyyo.
anya-e1212n:731: Mātuto ce pituto ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ cho hoti-mātubhagini mātucchā-“itthiyamatvā”ti ā-evampitucchā.
anya-e1212n:733: Mātāpituhi tesaṃ mātāpitusvāmaho hoti-mātu mātā mātāmahī-mātu pitā mātāmaho-pitu mātā pitāmahī-pitu pitāpi nāmaho.
anya-e1212n:735: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti-mātu hito matteyyo, pitu hito petteyyo.
anya-e1212n:737: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti kova tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇambhavati.
anya-e1212n:738: Doṇe parimāṇamassa doṇiko, (vīhi)-ekamparimāṇamassa ekakaṃ-dvikaṃ, tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakamiccādi.
anya-e1212n:740: Tārakādihi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ito hoti te
anya-e1212n:741: Ce sañjātā honti-tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitaṃ-(gaganaṃ)-pupchito-(rukkho).
anya-e1212n:743: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe matto hoti-phakhalaṃ ummānamassa khaphalamattaṃ. Hattho parimāṇamassa hatthamattaṃ, sataṃ mānamassa satamattaṃ.
anya-e1212n:745: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇe hoti matta tagghā ca-puriso ummānamassa porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ. Purisatagghaṃ.
anya-e1212n:746: Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttanaṇyaṇeyya ṇigha ṇiyā.
anya-e1212n:747_0: Bhavanti etasmā saddabuddhīti bhāvo saddappavatti nimittaṃ-kammaṃ kriyā-chaṭāṭhiyantā
anya-e1212n:747_1: bhāve kamme ca tta tādayo honti bahulaṃ-sāmaññavidhayo payogamanusārayantiti kuto
anya-e1212n:747_2: ci dvīsukuto ci bhāve yeva-na ca sabbe sabbato honti aññatra ttatāhi-nīlassa paṭāssa
anya-e1212n:747_3: bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatāti guṇe bhāvo-iha guṇavasā nilasaddonīlaguṇayutte dabbe vattate
anya-e1212n:747_7: abhāvattanti upacaritabhedasāmaññaṃ-alasassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā alasattaṃ alasatā-ttana,
anya-e1212n:749_0: Atisaye vattamānanato hontete paccayā-atisayena pāpo pāpataro, pāpatamo, pāpissiko.
anya-e1212n:750: Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyya mayā.
anya-e1212n:751_0: Pakatiyā uttaramavatthantaraṃ vikāro-chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre’vayave ca ṇadayo
anya-e1212n:751_1: honti bahulaṃ-ṇa, odumbaraṃ-(bhasmaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā)-ṇika, kappāsikaṃ-neyya, eṇeyyaṃ-maya.
anya-e1212n:754: Chaṭṭhiyantā samūhe kaṇṇaṇikā honti-mānussakaṃ. Kākaṃ, āpupikaṃ-“janādīhi tā”ti samūhe tā-janānaṃ samūho janatā. Gajatā, bandhutā.
anya-e1212n:756: Ekasmā asahāyatthe ka ākī honti-eko’va ekako, ekākī.
anya-e1212n:758_0: Upadvitīhi avayavavuttīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ayo hoti-ubho aṃsā assa
anya-e1212n:758_1: ubhayaṃ. Dvayaṃ. Tayaṃ-cintaṃ puraṇeccā diviggahe-“catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti
anya-e1212n:758_2: nipātanā pūraṇatthe dvito tiyo dvissa du ca ticatuhi atiyattāca-dutiyo. Tatiyo. Catuttho.
anya-e1212n:760: Chaṭṭhiyantāya pañcādikāya saṅkhyāya katismā ca mo hoti pūraṇatthe-pañcannaṃ puraṇe pañcamo-evaṃ sattamo, aṭṭhamo, iccādi.
anya-e1212n:762: Chasaddā ṭṭha ṭṭhamā honti puraṇatthe-channaṃ pūraṇe chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhamo vā.
anya-e1212n:764: Chaṭṭhiyantāyekādasādikāya saṅkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā-ḍakāro’nubandho-ekādasantaṃ pūraṇe ekādaso-aññatra-ekādasamoccādi-evaṃ dvādaso iccādi-ekūnavīsatyādihituḍe.
anya-e1212n:766: Se pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hotīti tilopo. Ekunavīso.
anya-e1212n:768: Satādikāya saṅkhyāya chaṭṭhiyantāya puranatthe mo hoti satā dinami cāntādeso-satassa pūraṇe satimo, sahassimo. Vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sate sahasse vāti evamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:770_0: Satyantāya mutyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti
anya-e1212n:770_1: sattamyatthe ḍo hoti sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti yadasminti tañce sataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ
anya-e1212n:770_2: vā hoti-tilope-vīsaṃ-sataṃ, sahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ vā-utyantāya-nahutaṃ-sataṃ. Sahassaṃ,
anya-e1212n:770_4: sahassaṃ. Satasahassaṃ vā-dasantāya-ekādasaṃ-sataṃ, sahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ vā-saccutīsāsadasantāyāti
anya-e1212n:770_5: kiṃ? Cha adhikā asmiṃ sate-adhiketi kiṃ? Pañcadasa hīnā asmiṃ sate-asminti kiṃ?Vīsati
anya-e1212n:770_6: adhikā etasmā satā-satasahasseti kiṃ? Ekādasādhikā assaṃ vīsatiyaṃ.
anya-e1212n:772: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthīti etesvatthesu mantu hoti-itisaddassa vivakkhāniyamanatthattā pahutādiyutteyeva atthyatthe hoti-vuttaṃhi.
anya-e1212n:775_0: Pahutā gāvo ettha dese assa vā purisassa santīti sagomāpasaṃsāyaṃ. Pasatthā jāti
anya-e1212n:775_1: assa atthīti jātimā-nindāyaṃ, valimāatisāyane, buddhimā-niccayoge, jutimā-saṃsagge,
anya-e1212n:777: Paṭhamantato avaṇṇantā mantvatthe vantu hoti-sīlavā, dayāvā-avaṇṇāti kiṃ? Buddhimā.
anya-e1212n:779: Daṇḍādīhi ika ī honti vā mantvatthe-daṇḍiko, daṇḍī-gandhiko gandhi-itisaddassa visasaniyamantthattā kuto ci dve kutoce kamekaṃva-nāviko, sukhī.
anya-e1212n:781: Tapādito vā ssī hoti mantvatthe-tapassī, yasassī-vātveca-yasavā.
anya-e1212n:785: Tapasaddā ṇe hoti mantvatthe-tāpaso-manādittā “manādīnaṃ saka”iti ṇanubandhe saka-“māyāmedhāhi vī”ti mantvatthe vī-māyāvi, medhāvī.
anya-e1212n:787: Pañcamyantā bahulaṃ to hoti-gāmasmā gāmato-imena kiṃ saddehi tomhi-“ito tetto kuto”ti imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭaeta kassa kuttañca-imasmā ito, etasmā ato etto, kasmā kuto.
anya-e1212n:789: Abhiādīhi to hoti-apañcamyantehipi vidhānatto’yaṃ-abhito, parito, pacchato, heṭṭhato.
anya-e1212n:791: Ādippabhutīhi to hoti-ādo ādito, majjhe majjhato, yaṃ yato.
anya-e1212n:793: Sabbādīhi sattamyantehi tratthā honti-sabbasmiṃ sabbatra, sabbattha-yasmiṃ yatra, yattha-bahulādhikārā na tumhāmhehi.
anya-e1212n:795: Ete saddā nipaccante-kasmiṃ kattha, kutra, kva-etasmiṃ ettha, atra-asmiṃ iha, idha.
anya-e1212n:801: Sattamyantā tato vāhaṃ hoti hiñca-tahaṃ, tahiṃ-vātveva-tatra.
anya-e1212n:803: Kiṃsaddā sattamyantā hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca-kuhiṃ kahaṃ-sabbasmiṃ kāleccevamādi viggahe.
anya-e1212n:805: Etehi sattamyantehi kāle dā hoti-sabbadā ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā.
anya-e1212n:807: Ete saddā nipaccante-kasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā-sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā-imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e1212n:810_0: Pakati paccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabbametaṃ nipātanā labbhati-imassa ṭo jjo vāhani
anya-e1212n:810_1: nipaccate-asmiṃ ahani ajja-samānassa sabhāvojju vāhati-samāne ahati sajju-aparasmā
anya-e1212n:810_2: jju vāhati-aparasmiṃ ahati aparajju-imasseto kālerahi ca-imasmiṃ kālñetarahi-kiṃsaddassa
anya-e1212n:812: Sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro, tattha vattamānehi sabbādīhi thā hoti-sabbena pakārena sabbathā-yathā, tathā.
anya-e1212n:814: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāreti kimimehi thaṃpaccayoketa tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ-kena pakārena kathaṃ, iminā pakārena itthaṃ.
anya-e1212n:815: Ekena pakārena ekaṃ vā pakāraṃ karoticcevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:817: Saṅkhyāvācīhi pakāre dhā paro hoti-ekadhā karoti-dvidhā,tidhā, catudhā, pañcadhā karoticcevamādiviggaho-bahusaddā vepullavācī saṅkhyāvācī ca-yadā saṅkhyāvācī tadā bahudhā karoti.
anya-e1212n:819: Ekasmā pakāre jjhaṃ vā hoti-ekajjhaṃ-vāti kiṃ, ekadhā.
anya-e1212n:821: Dvitīhi pakāre edhā vā hoti-medhā, tedhā-vātveva-dvidhā, tidhā-ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjaticcevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:823: Vārasambandhitiyā katisaṅkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti-kativāre bhujati katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1212n:825_0: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṅkhyāya dhā hoti kkhattuñca vārānañce paccāsatti hoti-bahuvāre
anya-e1212n:825_1: buñjati bahudhā vā divasassa buñjati, khahukkhattuṃ vā, paccāsattiyanti kiṃ, bahukkhattuṃ makāsassa bhuñjati.
anya-e1212n:827: Ekaṃ vāramiccasmiṃ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate ekasmā kiṃ ekassa ca sādeso-ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjati sakiṃ bhuñjati-vāti kiṃ, ekakkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1212n:829_0: Kriyāya guṇena dabbena vā bhinne atthe vyāpitumicchā vīcchāvīcchāyampakāre ca so
anya-e1212n:829_1: hoti bahulaṃ-sāmaññaniddesā yathāsambhavaṃ vibhattyantā yato kuto visaddā hoti-vicchāyaṃ-khaṇḍaṃ
anya-e1212n:829_2: khaṇḍaṃ karoti khaṇḍaso karoti-sabbena pakārena sabbaso.
anya-e1212n:831_0: Avatthāvato’vatthantarenābhutassa tāyāvatthāya bhāve karāsabhūhi sambandhe sati vakāravācakācī
anya-e1212n:831_1: hoti-cakāro“cī kriyatthehī”ti visesanattho-adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karotīti dhavalīkaroti-adhavalo
anya-e1212n:831_2: dhavalo siyā bhavati vā dhavalīsiyā. Dhavalībhavati-abhutatabbhā veti kiṃ, ghaṭaṃ
anya-e1212n:831_3: karoti-karāsabhuyogeti kiṃ. Adhavalo dhavalo jātate-vikārāti kiṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalīkaroti.
anya-e1212n:833_0: Atha tabbādayo vuccante kriyatthehi “kriyatthā”ti adhikārato, kriyā attho etassāti
anya-e1212n:833_1: kriyāttho(dhātu)-so ca dvividho sakammakā kamakmakavasena-tatta yasmiṃ kriyatthe
anya-e1212n:833_2: kattuvācini kammaṃ gavesīyate, so sakammako itaro akammako-tesu yathārahaṃ sakamma
anya-e1212n:833_3: kato kammādo kārake kammāvacanicchāyambhāve ca tabbādayo veditabbā-akammakato pana
anya-e1212n:833_4: bhāvo kammavajjite ca kārake-kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattarī kammevā
anya-e1212n:836: Kara karaṇe-akāro uccāraṇattho-evamuttaratrāpi-kariti ṭhite-bahulamiti sabbattha vattate.
anya-e1212n:838: Tabbaaniyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṃ bhavanti-paccayeti paccayavidhānatoññasmiṃ sabbatthādhikāro.
anya-e1212n:840: Tumādisu paccayesu vā karassa ā hoti-aññatra.
anya-e1212n:842_0: Kriyatthānamantabyañjanassa pararūpaṃ hoti yakārato’ññasmiṃ byañjanādo paccayeti
anya-e1212n:842_2: bhāvo dabbamiva pakāsatīti bahuvacanañca hoti-kamme-karīyatīti kātabboka kattabbo-abhidheyyasseva liṅgavacanāni.
anya-e1212n:844: Napuṃsake siyuṃ bhāve kto cāno akantarī;
anya-e1212n:849_0: Rāntato kriyatthā parassa paccayanakārassa ṇo hoti-karaṇīyaṃ-bahulādhikārā karaṇādisupi
anya-e1212n:849_3: ṭhā iccasmiṃ dhātumhi santamevopaṭṭhānatthaṃ upasaddo joteti-vuttaṃhi.
anya-e1212n:854: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ-ghakāraṇakārānubandhā.
anya-e1212n:856: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ kagā honti yathākkamanti vassa ko.
anya-e1212n:858: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa ā hoti-vuccatīti vākyaṃ-ci vaye-ghyaṇa.
anya-e1212n:860: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyattānaṃ e o honti yathākkamaṃ paccayeti issekāre“saramhā dve”ti yassa dvibhāve ca-cayanaṃ ciyatīti vā ceyyaṃ-dā dāne.
anya-e1212n:862_0: Ākārantato ghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu āssa e ca-dānaṃ dīyatīti vā deyyaṃ-vada pacane“vadādīhi
anya-e1212n:862_1: yo”ti bhāvakammesu yocavaggapubbarūpesu-vadanaṃ vaditabbaṃ vā vajjaṃ-ama gama gamane
anya-e1212n:862_2: vadādittā ye-gamanaṃ gamyateti vā gamyaṃ-guha saṃvaraṇe-“guhādīhiyaka”iti bhāvakammesu
anya-e1212n:864_0: Lahubhutassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa e o honti yathākkamaṃ paccayeti sampattasso kārassa
anya-e1212n:864_1: “nate kānubandhanāgamesu”ti paṭisedho-guhaṇaṃ guhitabbaṃ kavā guyhaṃ-vipallāso-sāsa anusaṭṭhiyaṃ-yaka.
anya-e1212n:866: Sāsassa vā sisa hoti kānubandhe-pubbarūpe-sāsīyatīti sisso-sisādesābhāvapakkhe-
anya-e1212n:868: Kriyatthā parassa byañjanādippaccayassa ñi vā hoti-ñakāro “ñi lasse”ti visesanattho,sāsiyo-vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa kvaci ñissābhāvo-kattabbaṃ.
anya-e1212n:870: Kattari kārake kriyatthā latuṇakā honti-lakāro “latupitādanamā simhī”ti visesanattho-dadātīti dātā-ṇake-
anya-e1212n:872: Akārantassa kriyatthassa yuka hoti ṇapito’ññasmiṃ ṇanubandhe, dāyako-vadhahiṃsāyaṃ-“ñibyañjanassā”ti ñi-vadhetītivadhitā,ṇake-“assānanubandhe”ti upantassa assa āttesampatte-
anya-e1212n:874: Kānubandhanāgamato’ññasmimpi te e o ā kvaci na hontīki paṭāsedho-vadhako-lucchedane.
anya-e1212n:876: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari-okāre-
anya-e1212n:878_0: Ñonamāyāvā honti yathākkamaṃ sarādo ṇanubandheti tassā vādeso-saraṃ luṇatīti saralāvo,
anya-e1212n:878_1: kumbhaṃ karotīti kumbhakāro-kvacīti kiṃ, kammakāro-ettha“bhāvakārakesva ghaṇaghakā”ti
anya-e1212n:879_0: Samānaññabhavantayāditupamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā samānādihi yādīhi copamānehi
anya-e1212n:879_1: parā disā kammakārake rīrikkhakā honti-“rānubande’ntasarādissā”ti disassa isabhāgassa
anya-e1212n:879_2: lope“rīrikkhakesū”-ti samānassa sādese ca-samāno viya dassatīti sadī, sadikkho-ke-
anya-e1212n:881: Te e o ā kānubandhe nāgame ca na hontīti ettābhāve, sadiso.
anya-e1212n:883: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīrikkakesūti pakkhe dassa rādese-sarī, sarikkho, sariso.
anya-e1212n:887_0: Rīrikkakesu nta kiṃ ima saddānaṃ ṭā kī ṭī honti yathākkamaṃ ṭakārā sabbādesatthā-bhavādī,
anya-e1212n:887_1: bhavādikkho, bhavādiso-yādi, yādikkho, yādiso-tyādi, tyādikkho, tyādisoccādi-tumhāmhā nantu ayaṃ viseso.
anya-e1212n:889: Rīrikkhakesutumhaamhānaṃ tā mā honte kasmiṃ yathākkamaṃ-tādi, mādi, tādikkho, mādikkho, tādiso, mādiso-ekैsminti kiṃ, tumhādiso, amhādiso-ci caye.
anya-e1212n:891: Bhave kārake ca kriyatthā a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulaṃ-a-issekāre.
anya-e1212n:893_0: Sare pare ñonamayavā honti yathākkamanti tassa ayādeso ca-vayanaṃ ciyatīti vācayo-nīpāpuṇane-vi
anya-e1212n:893_1: pubbovinayanaṃ vinetīti vā vinayo-ru sadde-ravanaṃ ravo-bhu sattāyaṃ. Bhavanaṃ bhavo-gaha
anya-e1212n:893_2: upādāne-pa pubbo-paggaṇhaṇaṃ paggaho-gaha mada dapa raṇa sara vara carādayo gahādayo-kara
anya-e1212n:893_3: karaṇe, kicchatthe dumhi akicchatthesu īsaṃ susu cuppadesu-dukkhena karīyatīti karaṇaṃ
anya-e1212n:893_4: vā dukkaraṃ-sukhena karīyatīti karaṇaṃ vā īsakkaraṃ, sukaraṃ-caja hāniyaṃ-ghaṇa-cajanaṃ
anya-e1212n:893_5: cāgo-paca pāke-ni pubbogha,nipacatīti nipako-khipa peraṇe-ka-khipatīti khipako-pītappaṇe.
anya-e1212n:895: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānamiyabuddhavaṅa honti sare kvacīti iyaṅa-ṇetīti piyo-bhu sattāyaṃ-abhi pubbo.
anya-e1212n:899_0: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hotīti kvilope-abhibhavatīti abhibhu-evaṃ sayambhu-ama
anya-e1212n:899_1: gama gamane-kvimhi-“kvimhi lopo’ntabyañjanassā”ti malopo-urasā gacchatīti urago-dā
anya-e1212n:899_2: dā ne-“ano”ti kriyatthā bhāvakārakesvāno-datti diyatīti vādānaṃ-saṃpa pubbe-sammā
anya-e1212n:899_3: padīyate yassa taṃ sampadānaṃ-apa ā pubbe-apādadāti etasmāti apādānaṃ-kara karaṇe-adhi
anya-e1212n:899_4: pubbo-“rā nassa ṇe”-ti ṇe-adhikarīyati etasminti adhikaraṇaṃ-gaha upādāne.
anya-e1212n:901: Tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇaḷā honti vā yathākkamanti nassa ṇadese-gaṇhitabbaṃ gahaṇaṃ-pada gamane-nipubbo.
anya-e1212n:903_0: Padādīnaṃ yuka hoti kvaci paccaye-nīpatti nipajjanaṃ-pī tappaṇe-anamhi vanādinā nāgame
anya-e1212n:903_1: ca’na te’ iccādinā e na hoti-pīti pīṇanaṃ-viji bhaya calanesu-saṃ pubbo-saṃvinti
anya-e1212n:903_2: saṃvejanaṃ-“aññatrāpī”ti ettābhāve-saṃvijanaṃ-kudha kope-kujjhati sīlenāti kodhano-bhikkha yācane.
anya-e1212n:904: Itthiyama ṇa kti ka yaka yā ca.
anya-e1212n:905_0: Itthilaṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo hontyano ca bahulaṃ-a-bhikkanaṃ bhikkhīyatīti
anya-e1212n:905_2: atthaniccayo-bhida vidāraṇe-kti-bhedanaṃ bhijjateti vā bhitti-rūja bhaṅge-ko-rujatīti
anya-e1212n:905_3: rujā-vida ñāṇe-yaka-vedanaṃ vidanti etāyāti vā vijjā-aja vaja gamane-pa puddho-yo-pabbaja
anya-e1212n:905_4: naṃ pabbajjā-“cavaggabayañā”ti yogavibhāgā vassa bakāre ñcittaṃ-vanda abhivādanatthutisu-ano-vandanaṃ vandanā.
anya-e1212n:907_0: Kriyatthassa sarūpe’bhidheyye kriyatthā pare i ki tī honti-i-vaca iccayaṃ dhātu eva
anya-e1212n:907_1: vaci-kimhi-yudhi-ti-sarupe timhi karo tissa khoti vikaraṇassa ñātattā “kattari lo”ti
anya-e1212n:907_2: lo-pacati-kathamakāro iccādi? Ghaṇantena kārasaddena chaṭṭhisamāso-assa kāro akāro-bhuja pālanajjhohāresu.
anya-e1212n:909_0: Kriyatthāṇi hoti sīlādīsu patīyamānesu-uṇhaṃ bhuñjati sīlenāti uṇhabhojī-pā pāne-“assāṇapimhi
anya-e1212n:909_1: yuka”iti-yuka-khīrambhikkhaññampibatīti khīrapāyī-avassaṃ karotīti avassakārī, satamavassaṃ dadātīti satandāyī.
anya-e1212n:911: Bhute parisamatte atte vattamānato kriyatthāktantuktāvī honti kattara-abhuñjīti bhuttavā, bhuttāvī-susavakaṇe-asuṇi tisutavā, sutāvī.
anya-e1212n:913: Bhāve kammeca bhute kto hoti-āsa upavesane-āsanamāsitaṃ-ñi-ruda rodane.
anya-e1212n:915: Te e o ā kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu-rodanaṃ ruditaṃ, roditaṃ-karīyitthāti kato,
anya-e1212n:918: Kānubandhe paccaye katvānakatvāvajjiteti ralopo-yā pā puṇane.
anya-e1212n:920_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari bhāvakammesu ca-yātavanto’sminti
anya-e1212n:922: Āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā nto hoti kattari.
anya-e1212n:924: Kuyatthato aparokkhesu kattuvihitamānantadisu lo hoti-lakāro“ñi lasse“-ti visesanattho-pavatīti pavanto-“māno“ti kattari māno-pacamāno.
anya-e1212n:926: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve kamme ca māno hoti.
anya-e1212n:928: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu mānantādisu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā-kakāro avuddhattho-bhāve-bhuyateti bhuyamānaṃ-kamme-paccateti paccamāno.
anya-e1212n:930_0: Anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā te ntamānā ssapubbā honti savisaye-ñi-kattari-pacissatīti
anya-e1212n:931: Tuṃ tāye tave bhāve bhavissatikriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ.
anya-e1212n:932_0: Bhavissatiatthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve tuṃ tāye tave honti kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ
anya-e1212n:932_1: patīyamānāyaṃ-“tuṃtunatabbesu vā”ti vā akāro-aññatra pararūpaṃ-karaṇaya gacchati

anya-e1212n:932_3: gacchati-kriyāyanti kiṃ, bhikkhissaṃ iccassa jaṭā-tadatthāyanti kiṃ, gacchissato
anya-e1212n:934: Eko kattā yesaṃ byāpārānaṃ tesu yo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā tunakatvāna katvā honti bhāve-ñi.
anya-e1212n:936: Eilāname hoti kvaci-gaṇhaṇaṃ katvā yāti gahetūna yāti, gahetvāna, gahetvā vā-assa rudhādittā.
anya-e1212n:938: Rudhādīnaṃ kvaci maṃ vā hoti paccayeti pakkhe maṃ bhavaṃ api manubandhattā akārā paro.

anya-e1212n:944: Idāni tyādayo vuccante-paca pāke-paca iti ṭhite-kriyatthā bahulamiti ca sabbattha vattate.
anya-e1212n:945: Vattamāneti anti sithamimate ante se vega emhe.

anya-e1212n:1016: Sattiyaṃ arahattheva kriyatthā eyyādayo honti-bhavaṃ khalu bhattaṃ paceyya, bhavaṃ samattho, bhavaṃ arabho.
anya-e1212n:1018: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti navibhāsā-api bhavaṃ gilitaṃ pāsāṇaṃ paceyya udaragginā-samhāvemi saddahāmi bhavaṃ paceyya,bhavaṃ pacissati. Bhavaṃ apaci.
anya-e1212n:1021: Pañho sampucchanaṃ iṭṭhā siṃsanaṃ yācanaṃ duve
anya-e1212n:1022: Patthanā bhattiyā vātha na navā vyāpāraṇa vidhi;
anya-e1212n:1023: Pañhe, kiṃ so bhattaṃ paceyya udāhu byañjanaṃ vā-patthanāyaṃ, aho vata so paceyya me-vidhimhi, bhavaṃ bhattaṃ paceyya.
anya-e1212n:1024: Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ ssu vho e āmase.

anya-e1212n:1048: Diva kīḷā vijigiṃsā vohārajjuti thuti gatīsu.
anya-e1212n:1050: Divādīhi lavisaye yaka hoti-kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho-evamuparica-dibbati dibbare dibbanticcādi-kamme-kivīyati dibbati divīyare diviyanti dibbare dibbanticcādi.

anya-e1212n:1095: So’kāsī piyadassi nāma yatidaṃ byattaṃ sukhappattiyā;
